title: Pokemonmanifesutohāto
title_japanese: ポケモンマニフェストハート
synopsis: The show focuses around a boy named Calvin and his 7 Pokemon that miraculously learned to talk one day.
background: Manifest Heart is a lovely and wonderfully One-Man animated Pokemon series. It has pretty good animation and is wonderfully action-packed with some emotional scenes. Overall, it's outstanding when it comes to the different kinds of characters and sexualities included in the show. The show focuses around a boy named Calvin and his 7 Pokemon that miraculously learned to talk one day.
